description: Returns tags for a resource. Tagging is currently supported only for directories with a limit of 50 tags per directory. All 50 tags are returned for a given directory with this API call.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. Tagging is only supported for directories.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of tag key value pairs that are associated with the response.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key that is associated with the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value that is associated with the tag.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
